title: Dasha Gaivoronski opens up about her son Leon being bullied at school
text:
Former Bachelor star Dasha Gaivoronski has opened up about the struggles her son Leon, 6, have experienced while living in Sydney.

On Tuesday, the 33-year-old penned a candid letter to fans on Instagram explaining that Leon has faced 'severe bullying' at school.

The Russian-born bombshell also revealed that she has even had to relocate homes to 'give him the better life'.

'I strongly disagree with Aussie upbringing': Bachelor star Dasha Gaivoronski (pictured) has opened up about the struggles her son Leon has experienced while living in Sydney

'Yesterday I was on the verge of yet another meltdown over the past few days - me and Leon moved into the new place,' she wrote.

'Leon is about to start the new school, where he hopefully won't experience that severe bullying he was dealing with at the previous school,' she continued.

Dasha explained that she had previously wanted to pursue a better life for her and her son in an 'upscale suburb' but there was 'a lot happening underneath the surface.'

Struggles: Dasha penned a candid letter on Instagram explaining that Leon has faced 'severe bullying' at school and she has had to relocate suburbs

'All the apartments in the area were quite tiny and old for the high price you're paying [but] I still did that because I thought - well as long as my baby is in the great school nothing else matters,' she wrote.

'Little did I know that there was actually a lot happening underneath the 'officially known cool' surface,' she added.

She continued: 'We're culturally different and I realised even more that I strongly disagree with the standard Aussie upbringing.'

Dasha wrote: : 'We're culturally different and I realised even more that I strongly disagree with the standard Aussie upbringing'

Dasha also said that it is difficult being a single mother and raising a boy without the support of a father.

She gave birth to her son in 2013 and has been a single mum ever since her eight year marriage with his father collapsed.

The 33-year-old has previously revealed that he was still in contact with her former husband, who lives in Russia.
